New_Brunswick.Metuchen Borough Hall:
Metuchen Borough Hall is the town hall for Metuchen, New Jersey located at 500 Main Street. The two-story concrete building, with brick facade and lettering Metuchen Municipal Building, was built in 2003 and dedicated on September 1, 2005. 
The building replaced an earlier structure that had built during the City Beautiful movement in 1924 and was demolished soon after its listing on the New Jersey Register of Historic Places and National Register of Historic Places in 2001.
